name: Unlimited - The Endless Runner
description:
Unlimited - The Endless Runner
A tricky game where you have to prove your skills!
Get the high score and beat your friends in the iOS Game Center. Collect coins to improve your player and get a better run. Throw balls to destroy cubes and activate interactive units. 6 different color waves with intelligent elements challenge your skill. Enjoy the self-composed music and beautiful environment.
** Translated into 10 languages including spanish, french, german, english, chinese, potugiesisch, korean, russian and japan **

** Game Center is integrated to share your highscores, challenge friends to play, and earn points for multiple achievements. **
